contentrichtext.text: A '''hatter''' is a person engaged in [[hatmaking]]. '''Hatter(s)''' also may refer to: *[[The Hatter]], a fictional character in ''Alice's Adventures in Wonderland'' * [[Luton Town F.C.]], team a.k.a. "The Hatters" * [[Stockport County F.C.]], team a.k.a. "The Hatters" * [[Les Miles]] LSU Tigers Head Football Coach. a.k.a. "The Mad Hatter" * The Hatter, mascot of [[Stetson University]]'s teams * Hatter, a fictional character in the 1970s ''Hatter Fox'' franchise originated by [[Marilyn Harris (writer)|Marilyn Harris]] * The 'Hatters, or [[MadHatters]], a singing group * A resident of [[Medicine Hat]], [[Alberta]], [[Canada]] * A [[hat tournament]], a sporting event in which the competitors join individually, and are assigned to teams randomly, as if drawn from a hat. == See also == * [[Mad Hatter (disambiguation)]] * [[Mad as a hatter (disambiguation)]] * ''[[Hatter's Castle]]'', novel {{disambig}}
